website_summaries.verdict: Palette is perfect for creating a range of subtle to dramatic looks. Excellent choice for beginners.
pros: Natural matte colors create beautiful daytime looks that can be easily transformed into nighttime looks
Offers a range of cool and warm undertones
Included eye-contouring instructions are easy to follow even for beginners
Shadows are highly pigmented and blend together seamlessly
cons: A few colors in the palette have some light fallout

customer_reviews.title: Need better quality control on shipments.
customer_reviews.text: Received my order last week.....it was coated in eye shadow dust inside and out. It took me 30 minutes to clean it up. One of the colors was cracked but that wasn’t the color of the powder all over the package inside and out. I almost sent it back but have read great reviews on the product so am going to give it a try. A discount would be appreciated for my trouble!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne longfellow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome palette!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product on a youtube video and was highly recommended. It had all my favorite shades so i decided to get myself a bday gift. Wow! It is everything as described. The colors are awesome and smooth. And the powder doesnt fall as you put it on like some cheaper brands. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Price is high but the product is exceptional so worth the money paid. Goes on true to color palette This will last me a year, so much variety.
customer_reviews.author: J&S Hobbies and Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Received item broken. Color ludwin came in pieces and ...
customer_reviews.text: Received item broken. Color ludwin came in pieces and fell as soon. As I opened it. Other color are lose in the palette. I leave overseas and don't have a way to exchange the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!  This is the first time I have ever bought an eye palette where I use all the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Great palette with all matte shades for hooded eyes and / or mature skin. The pigment is dark enough that little is needed for day time and easily layered for night time until you get the amount you want on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Case was broken
customer_reviews.text: Product was great but when it arrived the case was broken and the colors were not properly seated in the compact. This is the most I have ever paid for an eyeshadow palette so I was disappointed that the beautiful case was broken and that I had to tape it just to keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Miller

customer_reviews.title: A "must have" for eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful eye shadows! These colors are highly pigmented, easy to blend, and long wearing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lagatita87

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallet use everyday so many different neutral looks. Great for a higher end pallet. Reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: nowakowski

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it, packaged arrived on time and in tacked.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I can not describe how much I love this pallet! I saw a makeup artist post about it on her Instagram story as a "must-have for brides" so I had to check it out. The pigment is fantastic and the colors blend perfectly! Great both for day or night time looks. Just love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase I’ve wanted it for a long time and I regret not getting it sooner. Trusted and it’s not fake.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how often I use during the ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how often I use during the day. I just got it and have not used it yet. hoping it will last all day.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: I don't wear a lot of eye makeup but love this product and the simple directions for achieving the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear a lot of eye makeup but love this product and the simple directions for achieving the look I want
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect blending shades to either go "natural" or glamorous.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallet! Great quality I use every color which is rare for most color collections
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Matte Colors
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was recommended in a Dominique Sachse video and it is worth every penny. Anyone on the fence? Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Del Monte

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Amaze-balls! Great product, no damage, no issues. One of my fav palettes!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye shadow palette
customer_reviews.text: Kat Von D's make up line for shadows is my every once in a while splurge. I love the colors and theres a lot of matte colors to play with
customer_reviews.author: Ritsuka Keiko

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived broken. Eye shadow everywhere. My bathroom was a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A mess
customer_reviews.text: Open packaged and the box looked dirty. A couple of the powders were broken causing the shadows to be on everything
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Cracked pallets
customer_reviews.text: My item was delivered with cracked colors. Powder all over the palette since it was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Garza

customer_reviews.title: Came shattered. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Pallet came in package like this . My favorite color is broken completely. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Wright

customer_reviews.title: Matte Shades-yeah!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are all matte shades. I use the middle section the most.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. It's all I need...a set of neutral, warm, and cool nudes. The colors blend masterfully with no fallout. This is my daily go-to set now. I'm sorry I waited so long to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Orosz

customer_reviews.title: Love it, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors in this palette. Does not irritate my eyes and sets well.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. I wear the lightest shades during the day for a natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Mbg

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Good blending and color choices. Unfortunately it cakes in eye creases by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Elegant design shadow juat woooow and the colors are long listen thank u
customer_reviews.author: Ohoudi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Palette is gorgeous and so easy to use. Not a scam like some
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved how smooth this goes on and stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C. Wiehoff

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: So in love with this palette! The shadows are so creamy and pigmented. This is one I go for most every day. It is so pretty. There are plenty of looks to be created with this palette.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big for traveling and I only used two of the colors so the others were a waste.
customer_reviews.text: The eye shadow is very powdery. After applying the shadow to an applicator I tried blowing off the excess before applying to my eye. I ended up throwing it in the trash. Too big for traveling and I only used two of the colors so the others were a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen White

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It applies well and stays on most of the day. I love the natural shades and the fact that it is matte. I am in my late sixties and don't like all the shimmering eye shadows. It gives me more of a natural look which is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: This is an essential for any makeup junkie
customer_reviews.text: this palette is beautiful i have a medium/olive skin tone i do wish the middle contour color was a little brown not grey but either way i'll be using it as an eye shadow they blend easy and are really pigmented this is a must have essential
customer_reviews.author: LoveShopping123

customer_reviews.title: Love color HATE it doesnt come with brush to apply....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this palette BUT, I HATE that it does NOT come with a brush to apply it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Picki15

customer_reviews.title: WOW - LOVE THIS  (53 yo)
customer_reviews.text: Im 53 yo strawberry blonde with fair skin. This product is perfect for me in every way. It's matte, goes on like silk and doesn't crease, perfect color combinations, very flattering neutrals and some dark if more drama is wanted. I use this more than any other palette I own. Thrive Cosmetics are my very favorite - above and beyond any other makeup for quality and safety. But their eye shadow palette is just not the best colors for me - too coppery. The quality and colors of this palette are amazing for me. PLEASE DONT CHANGE THE FORMULA. I LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Shea

customer_reviews.title: and keep on producing good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have several (first time use) of Kat's eye shadow palettes. I have to say she has this product down - colors are very intense and minimal amount is needed to blend. If I had known all of this from the start, would have never bought any other eye palettes. Thanks, Kat, and keep on producing good quality.
customer_reviews.author: boho2m

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was sooooooooooo excited to purchase this item as I do not spend a great deal of money on make up so when I bought this product, it was a splurge and a treat to myself. Disappointingly, when the product arrived, some of the eye shadows had been compromised and there was eye shadow everywhere. I thought about returning it, but I didn’t want to go through the hassle so I cleaned it up and decided to keep it as Is. The colors are pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Raine Cline

customer_reviews.title: YouTube made me buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing rave YouTube reviews and tutorials. It has been a great buy so far. The shadows arrived intact, and they don't seem to be brittle after usage. The pigmentation is good, although I do find that I need to build up layers to achieve the depth of color I want. I would compare these to Mac or Makeup Geek in terms of pigmentation, and I feel they are most similar to Mac in terms of texture. If you love the creaminess of Makeup Geek, this will take some getting used to as I do love her shadows, but for a versatile Matte set, you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Customer service does not exist
customer_reviews.text: I have a pic but it's not loading. I had ordered this for my daughters early Christmas since she will be away. It arrived in the most dissatisfying appearance, it looked as if it had been used for a while and returned. I was very upset, and ended having to tun all over town to pay double for a new one Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Christopher

customer_reviews.title: UMMM...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of eye shadow pallets so I will keep this because I will not be using it every day but, I do feel like I am taking my chances with it. It came very poorly packaged, the box the pallet came in was torn, and it all looked very worn-like it had been on the self of TJ Max and tinkered with. When I opened it, I could tell it had been opened already and a few of the shadows looked slightly scratched-it was not an unopened item. Yes, I saved some money but, next time I will purchase from Ulta or Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicca Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect palette!
customer_reviews.text: This is my “go to” eye pallets, for sure. Now a Smokey Eye is easy and looks flawless. If it’s good enough for the news anchors, it’s good enough for me. They recommend this awesome palette and now in know why. All the colors are opaque and never fade.
customer_reviews.author: Donna (Orlando)

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure this is a fake pallete. Disappointing. The quality is not good and I’m mad that I didn’t return this earlier to get my money back. Shame on you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Came in quick and unbroken! Something I always worry about with shadows! The colors were exactly what I wanted and of great quality! Goes on easy asn blends well!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the shades, hate how it makes my eyes itch and water. I expected the quality to be better...
customer_reviews.author: Brandace L. Shehy

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loved it, said she might never be able to use anything else again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew William Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallet! The colors go on true. A little pricey, but worth it for makeup I'll actually use
customer_reviews.author: Heather Koehn

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: A nice quality product. Rich and deep pigments that go on smoothly and very blendable.
customer_reviews.author: mabary rfd

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this pallet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pallet, colors blend amazingly and stays on all day long. It is definitely a favorite of mine !!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly m marx

customer_reviews.title: Great pallette
customer_reviews.text: Great pallette. Best eyeshadow i've owned thus far. The color holds well and you do not need much product on your brush. Love the matte blend of colors. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: kelani

customer_reviews.title: love this set- all Matte colors which is so hard ...
customer_reviews.text: love this set- all Matte colors which is so hard to find and really well designed. I can tell it will last. Only one i use now.
customer_reviews.author: JP&RJSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product has great pigment and last throughout the day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Payton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great matte shadows for women who don't need the frosty look. I love mine!! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, blends well and has good staying power.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Kat Von D products and this one is no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Kat Von D products are top quality and worth the $!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with! the different looks
customer_reviews.text: I have been studying how to make the "smoky" eye. As I was watching youtube tutorials, a lady recommended this one. It was pretty expensive so I tried to find the same colors at my drugstore. Finally, I bit the bullet and bought this kit. It's fun to play with and even comes with directions for different eye looks. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: angela davies

customer_reviews.title: 'What a lovely set of eyeshadow colors no sparkle or glitter here!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product via a review and application that I saw done on You Tube. I love matte colors with no shimmer and this palate is spot on! You can have a natural look, a nude look, or a dramatic look by building up or layering the product on your eyes. These are gorgeous colors.
customer_reviews.author: fan in DC

customer_reviews.title: It's a quality product, but not my 1st choice.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'm in love with this or not. The colors are all on the darker end of the spectrum, but I almost feel like they aren't a good fit for my complexion. I've got fair skin and a lot of pink in my cheeks. I do think it's a quality product though for the most part. The shadows are pretty silky (I bet they break pretty easily), and the pigment is good. I need to play with it some, and see if I can learn to like it.
customer_reviews.author: S.C. Bicknell

product_meta.title: Kat Von D Shade + Light (Matte)
product_meta.description: Color:MulticolouredTransform your eyes through the art of contouring. After tapping into makeup pro secrets, Kat Von D created this first-of-its-kind eyeshadow palette, specially designed for eye contouring a groundbreaking technique once used only by beauty experts to define and enhance eyes. This palette features a gorgeous, versatile array of true contouring shades, arranged into three color quads neutral, cool, and warm to flatter every skin tone.
feature_bullets: Kat Von D Shade + Light Eye Contour Palette
